name: Circuit
description: Circuit is an oscilloscope-themed robot with a passion for exploring the digital world. With its sleek red body, reminiscent of the vibrant rossoCorsa shade, and classic button controls, Circuit is a true embodiment of retro-futurism. Equipped with rocket arms and legs, it can dart through the virtual realm with unmatched speed and agility. Its screen displays a timeless classic design, providing a nostalgic touch to its modern capabilities. To top it off, Circuit wears a pair of stylish glasses, giving it a distinguished and intellectual appearance.
